summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing execution of a Memorandum of Understanding amending Appendix "M" of the collective bargaining agreement between The City of Seattle and the Joint Crafts Council and its affiliate, the International Brotherhood of Boilermakers, Iron Shipbuilders, Blacksmiths, Forgers and Helpers, Local No. 104, to add the title Riser Maintenance Specialist; fixing compensation for the Riser Maintenance Specialist position at Seattle Center effective May 1, 1988; superseding inconsistent ordinances, and providing payment therefor.
